matrix.matrixImpl

Class MatrixSparse

  • java.lang.Object
    • matrix.matrixImpl.Matrix
      • matrix.matrixImpl.MatrixSparse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MatrixSparse
extends Matrix
    Provides implementation of a sparse 2d matrix. Its non-zero elements are store in a Map associated with a Terna as key. Although this implementation is space efficient, it adds complexities to several matrix operations.
    Author:
    Antonela Tommasel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
